newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Midway Games started at buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Midway Games started at buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said its analyst Genni Combes has started coverage on interactive game software maker Midway Games Inc with a buy rating based on its strong development team, history of producing top games and position in the Nintendo 64 game market.
-- Combes believes Midway Games can earn $0.92 a share on revenues of $345.1 million in 1997, up from an estimated $0.76 a share on revenue of $245.4 million in 1996.
-- Midway Games shares were up 1/8 at 21-5/8 by midday.
